resources.string: To get started, please log in using your email address. If you have not done so, please provide one so an account can be made for you. Once you are logged in, your location will be recorded and you will be presented a list of quests in your area.
Once you are logged in, your location will be determined and you will be presented a list of quests in your area.
Solving these quests will require a keen eye and a sharp mind. Are you up to the challenge?
That\'s all there is to it! Have fun questing! (press back button to exit)
